name: VoltSwap
description: VoltSwap is the first major DEX in the Meter ecosystem. It is a completely community-driven project and was introduced by the Meter.io team to showcase the capabilities of the Meter blockchain. In Q4 2021, Voltswap launched on Theta Mainnet beginning its cross-chain journey. The core products are :- 1. Decentralized exchange - Trading 2. Yield instruments – Farming 3. Staking derivatives – Staking Voltswap products are configured to allow decentralized governance of the entire platform by VOLT token holders.
